aircraft.value: Venom Attack - AC-5844-401 at Base Echo

defect_observed.value: Tail assembly rivet loosening. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Canopy System component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 26/04/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 29/04/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 29/04/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 03/05/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 01/05/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta
